description:
You are on [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. The variable number of customers can be determined for the following appointment-booking calendars: Appointment booking calendar for fixed opening hours, Appointment booking calendar for a specific event.
2. Specify how many customers can book an appointment slot at the same time. Thus, this corresponds to the maximum number of customers that can be served by you at the same time. Depending on the type of appointment booking calendar (for a concrete event or for fixed opening hours), you will find corresponding setting in different places.
title: Variable number of customers per appointment
